messages.subject: Ayashi no Ceres anime art book - on Ebay
messages.msgSnippet: I ve put up another book on ebay that people here might be interested in.  A full-color book of artwork from the anime/manga Ayashi no Ceres by Watase Yuu.
messages.messageBody:
I've put up another book on ebay that people here might be interested in. A full-color book of artwork from the anime/manga "Ayashi no Ceres" by Watase Yuu. It's a very nice high end art book, 120 pages, and fairly large at approximately 8 inches by 11.5 inches:

http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=190328023632

Thanks for looking, and thanks for your support of the Samurai Archives!
